column4: Hi, I downloaded the RPM file for LimeWire. I used alien to change it to a .deb file and installed it. but when I try to run LimeWire in the terminal I get "(" unexpected (expecting "}") . I was talking to a friend a while ago and he said to update java, I was running 6.10 at the time so I did, but it still wouldn't work so I had to use some special command to start it. My question now is,...
...Does 7.04 have updated java? WHat command would I need to use in order to start LimeWIre?
i belive limewire comes in tar.gz too
